title: Three Girls and a God
description: The muses were doing fine until he showed up....Dylan from Denver, on dinner with "I'm not sure, but I feel this is fate. I feel a connection to you.Plus, you are totally adorable -- just have dinner with me."Thalia, on dinner with "Stop stalking me."Thalia, Era, and Polly are giving life on earth another try. But it's hard for the Muse sisters to concentrate when Era's as flaky as always, and Polly is busy trying to prevent catastrophe. But the biggest problem of all comes disguised as a handsome, crazy football player who won't leave Thalia alone. The trouble is, she kind of likes him. But why does he seem so...familiar?Only the evil Furies know who "Dylan from Denver" really is, and there's no way they'll let him get his goddess....
author: Clea Hantman
